_Tsimikizani ngati nambala ya EMR ikugwilizana ndi ya mu m'buku la kuchipatala. Ngati zikusiyana konzani._
**Chonde lembani fomu ya pamwezi yofufuzira matenda pakati pa anthu oposera zaka zisanu ya mukamaliza kulembera banjali.**
**Chonde lembani fomu ya pa mwezi yofufuzira matenda pakati pa ana ochepera zaka zisanu ya mukamaliza kulembera banjali.**
Nambala ya NCD EMR yomwe mwalowetsayi mwayitenga kuti?
Sankhani nthenda ina iliyonse yomwe munthuyi ali nayo
Zitsanzo- nthenda yokutha magazi, nthenda ya chiwindi, kufa ziwalo, nthenda youmitsa mafupa

Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala

Kodi wakhala nthawi yayitali bwanji pa mankhwala a TB?
Tsiku lobadwa ndi zaka zomwe munthu ali nazo pa nthawiyo

bind.calculate: if(../dob_calendar > today(), 'Date of birth should not be greater than today.', if(../dob_calendar > date-time(decimal-date-time(today() - (int(../c_cohort_constraint_lower) * 365))) and ../dob_calendar < date-time(decimal-date-time(today() - (int(../c_cohort_constraint_upper) * 365))), concat('Age must be between ', /data/person/ephemeral_dob/c_cohort_constraint_lower , ' and ', /data/person/ephemeral_dob/c_cohort_constraint_upper , '.'), concat('Age must be between ', /data/person/ephemeral_dob/c_cohort_constraint_lower , ' and ', /data/person/ephemeral_dob/c_cohort_constraint_upper , '.')))

if( /data/person/ephemeral_dob/person_age_months <= 24 and /data/person/ephemeral_dob/dob_calendar != '', 0, if( /data/person/ephemeral_dob/person_age_months > 24 and /data/person/ephemeral_dob/person_age_months < 60, 1, if( /data/person/ephemeral_dob/person_age_months >= 60 or selected( /data/person/ephemeral_dob/cohort , 'over_5'), 2, 3)))

if(selected(../conditions, 'none') and (count-selected(../conditions) > 1), 'None cannot be selected with any other choice!', if(selected(../conditions, 'eid') and selected(../conditions, 'art'), 'EID cannot be selected with ART!', ''))

bind.constraint: not(selected(../conditions, 'none') and (count-selected(.) > 1)) and not(selected(../conditions, 'eid') and selected(../conditions, 'art'))

itemset.nodeset: instance('conditions')/root/item[is_lte_2 = /data/person/condition_age_group or is_btw_2_5 = /data/person/condition_age_group or is_over_5 = /data/person/condition_age_group or other = /data/person/condition_age_group ]
